thread.title: Ground News - Tahnoon bin Mohammed: a new year of work and giving
thread.title_full: Ground News - Tahnoon bin Mohammed: a new year of work and giving

author: aletihad.ae
title: Ground News - Tahnoon bin Mohammed: a new year of work and giving
text:
Summary by aletihad.ae Al Ain (Al-Ittihad) congratulated His Highness Sheikh Tahnoon bin Mohammed Al Nahyan, the ruler's representative in Al Ain region, on the New Year. His Highness said on the “X” platform: “We bid farewell to a past year that has seen the UAE's excellent steps towards urbanization and prosperity. We welcome a new year of work, giving and giving. We ask Allah to have a good year, development and stability. Happy new year.” Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
